Plot: A free-spirited woman "kidnaps" a yuppie for a weekend of adventure. But the fun quickly takes a dangerous turn when her ex-convict husband shows up.
Title: Something Wild
Actors: Jeff Daniels, Melanie Griffith, George 'Red' Schwartz, Leib Lensky
tomatoConsensus: Boasting loads of quirky charm, a pair of likable leads, and confident direction from Jonathan Demme, Something Wild navigates its unpredictable tonal twists with room to spare.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 3 nominations.
